list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device or substance that is used to join two things together so as to prevent them from coming apart or to prevent anything from passing between them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: blue smoke from the exhaust suggests worn valve seals
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khói xanh từ khí thải gợi ý niêm phong van mòn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of wax, lead, or other material with an individual design stamped into it, attached to a document to show that it has come from the person who claims to have issued it.
a thing regarded as a confirmation or guarantee of something.
the obligation on a priest not to divulge anything said during confession.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I was told under the seal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã nói dưới con dấu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fish-eating aquatic mammal with a streamlined body and feet developed as flippers, that returns to land to breed or rest.
a member of an elite force within the US Navy, specializing in guerrilla warfare and counterinsurgency.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he folded it, sealed the envelope, and walked to the mailbox
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta gập nó, bịt kín phong bì, và đi bộ đến hộp thư

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: apply a nonporous coating to (a surface) to make it impervious.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: seal the finish with a satin varnish
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Niêm phong kết thúc với một vecni satin

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fry (food) briefly in hot fat to prevent it from losing too much of its moisture during subsequent cooking.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: heat the oil and seal the lamb on both sides
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đun nóng dầu và niêm phong con chiên ở cả hai bên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: conclude, establish, or secure (something) definitively, excluding the possibility of reversal or loss.
fix a piece of wax or lead stamped with a design to (a document) to authenticate it.
